=======
History
=======

0.2.0 (2016-01-27)
------------------

* Rename `tg_utils.yuglify` module to `tg_utils.compressor_filters` and
  added new filters for using UglifyJS 2 and clean-css.
* Added docs for `tg_utils.compressor_filters` module.


0.1.1 (2016-01-11)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
